channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Social Chat – Click To Chat App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Social Chat – Click To Chat App

item.title: CVE-2022-2361|2024-08-03T00:32:09.618Z -- unknown -- wp%20social%20chat%20%E2%80%93%20click%20to%20chat%20app
item.description: The WP Social Chat WordPress plugin before 6.0.5 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
